original: For the duration of this spell, the caster projects their voice to communicate with a target. Anyone within a 30ft radius of the target can hear the caster’s voice. The caster can also hear sounds close to the target, allowing for two-way communication.\n\nThe target must be a person known to the caster. That person must also be conscious. Otherwise, the spell will fail. Alternatively, the target can be an object that is attuned to the caster’s magic.
translation: 法术生效期间，施法者可以通过让目标听见自己的声音来联络。目标30英尺内的任何人都能听见施法者的声音。施法者也能听见目标周围的声音，保证双向联络。\n\n目标必须是施法者认识的人，且存有意识，否则法术将失败。除此之外，目标也可以是附有施法者魔力的物体。
